resources.string: "Custom application to monitor advancement of tasks in Lost Ark."

"---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- v2.0: -Add auto update mechanism ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- v1.4: -Add an how to section in menu -Add Glaivier class -Add few icons (quests) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- v1.3: -Manage task present on certain days -Can remove or add task for only one character -Add the possibility to complete a task by boat (stronghold). Just hold click on a task checkbox(full mode) / logo (compact mode) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- v1.2: -Fetch all icons from android's phone resources if wanted during task icon selection ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- v1.1: -Icon selector when creating a task -Rework UI and colors ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- v1.0: -Working application with base feature (creation character and task and monitor rest on chaos and guardian ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
